caption: I forgot to write my review I tried them on their first day opening and I must say the food was delicious besides that and equally important the staff is very friendly I’m about to place another order for their snow crab and shrimp combo this will be my second time the garlic and butter and the Bobo special was delicious.
Still testing the menu. So far everything type fire once they get the seasoning down packed it’s lit but the Buffalo wings are odee but they need more sauce coming back with GANG
Tried BOBO's  for the first time today. It was great! The wait staff were friendly. Willing to correct any mistakes. Keep up the great work for just opening. Will return soon.
